PACKS WILL BE ISSUED TO THE OFFICERS WHO DO NOT HAVE A LARGE PACK FOR STORAGE OF EQUIPMENT AND GEAR. THE ADDITIONAL PACKS WILL BE USED FOR STORAGE OF EQUIPMENT AND FOR USE ON EMERGENCY SITUATIONS WHERE ADDITIONAL GEAR MAY BE NEEDED.

TOOLBOXES WILL BE USED FOR THE STORAGE OF TOOLS AND OTHER EQUIPMENT USED BY THE POLICE DEPARTMENT. TOOLBOXES MAY ALSO BE USED IN PATROL VEHICLES FOR ADDITIONAL STORAGE FOR TOOLS OR OTHER ITEMS USED WHILE ON PATROL OR RESPONDING TO CRIME SCENES.

DEFIBRUTATOR WILL BE PLACED IN PATROL UNITS FOR OFFICERS TO USE IN SITUATIONS THAT REQUIRE A DEFIBRULATOR. THE DEFIBRULATOR'S WILL ALSO BE UTILIZED DURING SPECIAL ASSIGNMENTS WHERE LARGE NUMBERS OF PEOPLE WILL BE PRESENT IN CASE OF A MEDICAL EMERGENCY SITUATION.

SLEEPING MATS WILL BE UTILIZED BY OFFICERS WHEN THE NEED TO TRAVEL EXIST AND REQUIRES THE OFFICERS TO SLEEP OUTSIDE. MATS WILL ALSO BE USED IN POLICE EMERGENCY RESPONSE VEHICLES FOR WHEN OFFICERS TRAVEL TO ASSIST OTHER AGENCIES IN DISASTER SITUATIONS.

MARKER BOARDS WILL BE USED IN THE POLICE DEPARTMENT FOR OFFICER REMINDERS AND FOR ADDITIONAL SHIFT REPORTING OF INCIDENTS AND OFFICER SAFETY REMINDERS. BOARDS CAN ALSO BE USED FOR TRAINING AND OTHER PURPOSES RELATED TO PATROL SHIFTS.

THE COVINA PD WILL USE THIS ENGINE AS A REPLACEMENT ENGINE FOR OUR ARMORED RESCUE VEHICLE.  THIS VEHICLE RECENTLY EXPERIENCED AN ENGINE FAILURE AND IT REQUIRED OVER A YEAR TO OBTAIN AND INSTALL A REPLACEMENT ENGINE.  THIS ENGINE WILL REDUCE THAT TIME IF A FAILURE WAS TO OCCUR TO ONE WEEK.  THIS ARMORED RESCUE VEHICLE IS CRITICAL TO COMMUNITY SAFETY AND ENSURING IT IS OPERATIONAL IS VITAL.

THIS WILL ENSURE THAT NO MATTER WHAT MIGHT OCCUR, FUEL WILL BE AVAILABLE TO CONTINUE OPERATING DEPARTMENT VEHICLES AND GENERATORS.  THREE TANKSWILL ALLOW DELIVERY OF AN ENTIRE FUEL ORDER PER FUEL TYPE.

THE COVINA PD WILL USE THIS TORQUE WRENCH WHEN SERVICING OR REPAIRING DEPARTMENT FIREARMS.  CERTAIN REPAIRS REQUIRE PARTS BE SECURED TO A SPECIFIC TORQUE ENSURING THE FIREARM WORKS PROPERLY.

THE COVINA PD WILL USE THESE LIGHT STICKS DURING NIGHT TIME INCIDENTS OR ACTIVITIES REQUIRING MARKING OR SIGNALING.  EXAMPLES INCLUDE TRAFFIC CONTROL WHERE PERSONNEL ARE DIRECTED TRAFFIC OR FIREARMS TRAINING AT NIGHT MARKING SAFE LANES OF FIRE.

THE COVINA PD WILL USE THESE CHARGERS TO RECHARGE THE BATTERIES USED IN OUR ROBOTS, RADIOS, AND PORTABLE FLOOD LIGHTS.  THE ABILITY TO RECHARGE THESE BATTERIES IS CRITICAL TO THE OPERATION OF THIS EQUIPMENT.

THE COVINA PD WILL USE THESE LIGHTS WHEN CONDUCTING CRITICAL TASKS REQUIRING POSITIONAL LIGHTING SUCH AS WHEN REPAIRING OR INSPECTING DEPARTMENT FIREARMS DURING REGULAR INSPECTIONS BE CERTIFIED DEPARTMENT ARMORERS OR WHEN EXAMINING EVIDENCE BY TRAINED EVIDENCE TECHNICIANS. THE ABILITY TO SEE DURING THESE TYPES AF ACTIVITY IS CRITICAL AND THESE LIGHTS WILL AID OFFICERS IN THESE TASKS.

EVERY LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICER IS ISSUED AN M16-AR15 STYLE RIFLE.  THESE RIFLES ARE CARRIED IN EVERY LAW ENFORCEMENT VEHICLE.  THESE REFLEX SIGHTS GREATLY IMPROVE THE USABILITY AND EFFECTIVENESS OF THE RIFLE.  THEREFORE, WE WANT TO EQUIP EVERY RIFLE WITH A REFLEX SIGHT.

OUR DEPARTMENT HAS A SPECIAL RESPONSE TEAM (S.W.A.T. TEAM) WITH LAW ENFORCEMENT SNIPERS.  THE TEAM IS CALLED UPON TO OPERATE AT NIGHT FOR HIGH RISK LAW ENFORCEMENT OPERATIONS.  THESE DEVICES CAN BE MOUNTED ON RIFLES OR CAN BE UTILIZED AS HANDHELD DEVICES.  THIS CAPABILITY IS GREATLY DESIRED AND HAS PROVEN ITSELF TO BE NEEDED ON RECENT MISSIONS.

THE MULTI-PURPOSE VEHICLE WOULD BE USED AS A AN ALL HAZARDS RESPONSE VEHICLE FOR USE IN CRITICAL INCIDENTS BOTH MAN MADE AND NATURALLY OCCURRING.  OUR AGENCY SWAT, ERT, AND  MMF TEAMS ARE TIER 1 RESPONSE TEAMS FOR FLORIDA'S REGION 5 DOMESTIC SECURITY TASK FORCE WHICH ENCOMPASSES A NINE COUNTY REGION.  THE CONTROLLED EQUIPMENT WOULD BE AVAILABLE FOR OTHER AGENCIES WITHIN THE REGION AND THE STATE OF FLORIDA BUT WOULD BE MANNED AND OPERATED BY TRAINED ORANGE COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE DEPUTIES.

FOR USE WITH CARRYING BREACHING TOOLS DURING CRITICAL MISSIONS OR TRAINING. BAG WILL ALLOW THE OPERATOR TO CARRY TOOLS ESSENTIAL TO THE JOB AT HAND. TOOLS WILL ALLOW THE OPERATORS TO DUE THEIR JOBS SUCCESSFULLY WITHOUT WAITING ON TOOLS TO BE DELIVERED.

FOR USE DURING NATURAL DISASTERS WHERE DEPUTIES WILL USE TOOL TO HELP CLEAN AND REMOVE DEBRIS FROM ROADWAYS AND OTHER AREAS OF CLEANUP. TOOLS WILL HELP DEPUTIES MOVE LARGE OBJECTS WITHOUT PUTTING THE DEPUTIES IN HARMS WAY.

FOR USE IN SQUAD ROOM WHERE DEPUTIES WRITE REPORTS, LOG EVIDENCE, TAKE ROLL CALL. TRASH CANS WILL BE USED BY DEPUTIES DESK TO DISCARD UNWANTED PAPER, TRASH, AND DOCUMENTS TO KEEP FROM CLUTTERING WORK STATION. TRASH CANS WILL HELP REDUCE AMOUNTS OF TRASH CANS LOCATED IN DEPUTIES OFFICE.

THE SHERIFFS OFFICE HAS REQUISITIONED LASERS AND HAS RECOGNIZED THE IMPORTANCE OF CHANGING THE SHAPE THAT EACH LASER PROJECTS.  THESE PATTERN KITS WILL ALLOW EACH OFFICER ISSUED A LASER TO CHOOSE A UNIQUE PATTERN FOR THEIR LASER.  HAVING MULTIPLE PATTERNS DOWNRANGE ALLOWS FOR EACH OFFICER TO CLEARLY IDENTIFY THEIR LASER FROM ANY OTHERS WITHIN VIEW.  THIS INCREASES SAFETY AND ACCURACY.

CHEM LIGHTS ARE A CONSUMABLE ITEM THAT HAVE MANY USES WITHIN THE SHERIFFS OFFICE.  THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT AND PATROL USE THEM AS MARKERS FOR NIGHT TRAINING.  THEY MARK SAFETY OFFICERS AND PROVIDE GENERAL ILLUMINATION.  CHEM LIGHTS COME IN A VARIOUS COLORS TO DESIGNATE DIFFERENT THINGS DEPENDING ON USE.

THIS TORQUE LIMITING SCREWDRIVER SET WILL BE USED IN THE SHERIFFS OFFICE ARMORY.  THERE ARE MANY ITEMS DURING SERVICING THAT REQUIRE A PROPER TORQUE WHEN INSTALLING.  THE SCREWDRIVER WILL ALLOW ARMORERS TO COMPLETE THIS WORK AS REQUIRED BY CERTAIN MANUFACTURES.

THESE ILLUMINATORS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE ON RIFLES AND SHOTGUNS AND LESS LETHAL DEVICES WITHIN THE SHERIFFS OFFICE.  THE ILLUMINATORS HAVE A COMBINED VISIBLE AND IR LASER.  THIS ALLOWS THE WEAPONS TO BE DISCHARGED WHEN SHOOTING FROM NON TRADITIONAL POSITIONS AND WITH GAS MASKS.  GAS MASKS LIMIT THE ABILITY TO SHOOT WITH THE WEAPON PROPERLY SHOULDERED.

CHEM LIGHTS ARE A CONSUMABLE ITEM THAT HAVE MANY USES WITHIN THE SHERIFFS OFFICE.  THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT AND PATROL USE THEM AS MARKERS FOR NIGHT TRAINING.  THEY MARK SAFETY OFFICERS AND PROVIDE GENERAL ILLUMINATION.  CHEM LIGHTS COME IN A VARIOUS COLORS TO DESIGNATE DIFFERENT THINGS DEPENDING ON USE.

THESE SWITCHES ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE ON TACTICAL LIGHTS ALREADY ACQUIRED THROUGH THE 10 33 PROGRAM.  THE SWITCHES ALLOW FOR WEAPON LIGHTS TO BE ACTIVATED WITH THE WEAK SIDE SHOOTING HAND.  THEY ALSO ALLOW FOR MOMENTARY ACTIVATION.  THIS KEEPS THE LIGHTS OFF WHEN NOT NEEDED TO INCREASE OFFICER SAFETY AND PREVENT GIVING AWAY AN OFFICERS LOCATION.

THE SHERIFF'S OFFICE CURRENTLY HAS A ROBOT THAT DOES NOT OPERATE.  THIS INCOMPLETE ROBOT IS BEING REQUESTED FOR PARTS.  THE NON WORKING ROBOT WILL BE RETURNED TO DLA.  THE ROBOT HAS BEEN USED WITH GREAT SUCCESS DURING HIGH RISK INCIDENTS.  IT HAS BEEN USED TO ENTER UNKNOWN AREAS LEAVING OFFICERS OUT OF HARMS WAY.  GETTING THE ROBOT TO FUNCTION AGAIN IS A HIGH PRIORITY.

THESE LADDERS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT AND INVESTIGATION DIVISION. THE LADDERS ARE VERY COMPACT MAKING STORAGE AND TRANSPORTATION MUCH EASIER. THE LADDERS WILL ALLOW OFFICERS TO ACCESS AREAS THAT WOULD NORMALLY BE OUT OF REACH. THIS WILL INCREASE SAFETY DURING HIGH RISK SEARCHES AND HELP DURING INVESTIGATION OF CRIME SCENES.

EAR PLUGS ARE A CONSUMABLE ITEM THAT IS IN CONTINUOUS NEED WITHIN THE SHERIFFS OFFICE RANGE AND TRAINING CENTER.  THIS FACILITY IS USED BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE AND LOCAL POLICE AND MULTIPLE OTHER AGENCIES FOR QUALIFICATIONS AND TRAINING WITH DUTY WEAPONS.  HAVING A SUPPLY OF EAR PLUGS AVAILABLE AT ALL TIMES ENSURES THAT OFFICERS ADHERE TO PROPER SAFETY MEASURES IN REGARDS TO THEIR HEARING.

TIE DOWN STRAPS ARE USED BY THE RECREATIONAL ENFORCEMENT DIVISION FOR SECURING SNOWMOBILES AND ATVS TO TRAILERS FOR TRANSPORT.  THE STRAPS ARE REPLACED FREQUENTLY DUE TO WEAR.  KEEPING THE STRAPS REPLACED ENSURES THAT THEY ARE IN SERVICEABLE CONDITION.

PENS ARE A CONSUMABLE ITEM USED BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE FOR MANY THINGS.  THESE PENS ARE UNIQUE IN THAT THEY WRITE BETTER THAN A STANDARD BALL POINT IN ADVERSE WEATHER.  PENS ARE RESISTANT TO FREEZING TEMPERATURES AND WET CONDITIONS.  THESE ARE TWO THINGS THAT PATROL OFFICERS FACE ROUTINELY.

THESE TETHERS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE TACTICAL RESPONSE TEAMS. THESE TEAMS WILL USE THE TETHERS TO SECURE ITEMS TO THEIR EQUIPMENT SO THEY ARE NOT LOST OR TAKEN BY A SUSPECT DURING EMERGENCY SITUATIONS. THE DIVE AND RESCUE TEAM WILL ALSO USE THE TETHERS FOR SECURING TOOLS AND OTHER ITEMS TO THEIR SUITS DURING DIVES TO PREVENT LOSS.

THESE MOUNTS WILL BE USED TO MOUNT EXSISTING NIGHT VISION DEVICES TO BALLISTIC HELMETS. THIS KEEPS THE NIGHT VISION DEVICE HANDS FREE FOR THE OFFICER USING IT.  BEING HANDS FREE ALLOWS THE OFFICER TO PERFORM TASKS KEEPING HANDS FREE AND AVAILABLE FOR SAFETY.

TARPS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE SHERIFFS OFFICE SCUBA DIVING AND RECOVERY TEAM.  THE TEAM USES TARPS AT SCENES TO KEEP EQUIPMENT FROM MAKING DIRECT CONTACT WITH THE GROUND.  THE TARPS ARE PLACED OVER THE GROUND AND USED TO ORGANIZE AND DRY EQUIPMENT.

THESE SIGHT SYSTEMS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT.  THIS UNIT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR EXECUTING HIGH RISK SEARCH AND ARREST WARRANTS.  THESE SIGHTS ARE CAPABLE OF BEING MOUNTED IN FRONT OF THE WEAPONS PRIMARY OPTIC ENHANCING ITS CAPABILITIES.  THE SIGHT IS THERMAL BASED SO IT ALLOWS FOR VIEWING DURING THE DAY AND NIGHT AND IN ADVERSE WEATHER INCLUDING SMOKE AND FOG.  SYSTEM ALSO OFFERS BETTER SCENE SURVEILLANCE.
BLANKETS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR ISSUE TO PATROL STAFF.  THE BLANKETS WILL BE UTILIZED IN SQUAD MEDICAL KITS.  BLANKETS CAN BE USED FOR PATIENT CARE DURING WINTER MONTHS.

SAFETY GLASSES ARE AN ITEM THAT GETS REPLACED FREQUENTLY IN THE SHERIFF'S OFFICE RANGE AND TRAINING CENTER.  THIS FACILITY HOSTS TRAINING FOR OUR AGENCY AND SEVERAL OTHER LOCAL AND STATE AND FEDERAL AGENCIES.  THESE SAFETY GLASSES WILL BE USED TO REPLACE OLDER GLASSES USED BY OUR INSTRUCTORS DURING TRAINING.

THESE LIGHTS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE ON THIS AGENCIES MRAP.  THE LIGHTS WILL PROVIDE ENOUGH LIGHTING TO INSTALL 360 DEGREE COVERAGE AROUND THE MRAP.  THIS WILL GIVE AMPLE SCENE LIGHTING WHILE WORKING DURING HOURS OF DARKNESS.  GOOD SCENE LIGHTING IS IMPORTANT TO THE SAFETY OF OFFICERS AND CIVILIANS.  THE LIGHTS ALSO HAVE AN IR FUNCTION THAT ALLOWS THEM TO BE USED WITH THE AGENCIES NIGHT VISION DEVICES.

THIS BINOCULAR IS BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE BOAT AND WATER DIVISION. THE BINOCULAR WILL HELP AID IN OBSEVATION OF OBJECTS WHILE PATROLLING THE WATERWAYS. BEING ABLE TO SCAN DISTANT AREAS INCREASES THE OFFICERS ABILITY TO SPOT EMERGENCIES AND CRIMINAL ACTIVITY.

HEADSETS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE BY THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE UNIT.  THE HEADSETS CAN BE USED WITH NEW HELMET STYLE RECENTLY DEPLOYED.  THE HEADSET OFFERS HEARING PROTECTION WHILE SHOOTING AND USING DISTRACTION DEVICES.  AT THE SAME TIME THE HEADSET ALLOWS FOR NORMAL SOUND LEVELS TO PASS THROUGH GIVING AN OFFICER SITUATIONAL AWARENESS.  THE HEADSETS ARE ALSO COMPATIBLE WITH DEPARTMENT RADIOS.

BAGS ARE BEING REQUESTED FOR USE WITHIN THE SHERIFF'S OFFICE AND GOVERNMENT CENTER BUILDING.  THE SECURITY DIVISION IS CREATING BAGS FOR USE DURING ACTIVE SHOOTER AND OTHER RELATED EVENTS.  THE BAGS WILL BE FILLED WITH MEDICAL SUPPLIES AND LIGHTS AND OTHER ITEMS NECESSARY IN SUCH AN EVENT.  THESE BAGS ARE LOW PROFILE AND SMALLER IN SIZE MAKING THEM AND IDEAL BAG.

HEADLAMPS WILL BE ISSUED TO PATROL OFFICERS FOR USE DURING LOW LIGHT AND NO LIGHT SITUATIONS.  THE HEADLAMP PROVIDES THE OFFICER WITH AN ABILITY TO USE BOTH HANDS WHILE COMPLETING TASKS.  THE LIGHT HAS A GREEN FLIP DOWN FILTER THAT HELPS PRESERVE VISION WHILE DARK.

SCOPES WOULD BE UTILIZED TO OUTFIT A PATROL DIVISION AND SWAT TEAM OF A 67 PERSONNEL SHERIFFS OFFICE. SCOPES WOULD GREATLY ENHANCE ACCURACY, EFFICIENCY, OFFICER SAFETY AND CONFIDENCE DURING RURAL AND URBAN MANHUNT OPERATIONS, WARRANT SERVICES, AND CLOSE QUARTER ROOM CLEARING. SCOPES WOULD BE USED TO AID OFFICERS DURING LOW LIGHT NIGHTTIME OPERATIONS AND AID ACCURACY DURING DAYTIME OPERATIONS.

JONES COUNTY SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT INTENDS TO UTILIZE THE MRAP FOR SWAT OPERATIONS, ACTIVE SHOOTER SITUATIONS, SUPPORT OF HOMELAND SECURITY OPERATIONS, EMERGENCY RESPONSE, COUNTER DRUG AND NARCOTICS OPERATIONS, HIGH RISK WARRANT SERVICE, SEARCH AND RESCUE OF MISSING PERSONS, COUNTER TERRORISM, HOSTAGE RESCUE, HUMAN TRAFFICKING AND SEVERE WEATHER INCIDENTS. THIS MRAP WILL GREATLY INCREASE DEPUTY AND CITIZEN SAFETY IN JONES COUNTY, MISSISSIPPI AND OTHER JURISDICTIONS NEEDING ASSISTANCE.

DUE TO THE INCREASE OF VIOLENT ARMED SUSPECTS THAT OUR DEPARTMENT IS ENCOUNTERING, HAVING THE ABILITY TO USE AN ARMORED VEHICLE PROTECT OFFICERS AND CIVILIAN LIVES WOULD BE A GREAT ASSET.   OUR DEPARTMENT IS RESPONSIBLE FOR THE TACTICAL RESPONSE NOT ONLY FOR OUR AREA OF OPERATION BUT ALSO THAT OF THREE MUNICIPALITIES.  HAVING THIS ARMORED VEHICLE WOULD DRASTICALLY CUT DOWN ON THE RESPONSE TIME OF OUR TACTICAL TEAM AS WELL AS BE A GREAT DETERRENT TO OFFENDERS IN THE FUTURE.

THIS VEHICLE WILL BE USED FOR SUCH DETAILS AS HOSTAGE RESCUE, ACTIVE SHOOTER SITUATIONS, HIGH RISK WARRANT ARREST, BARRICADED SUSPECTS, RIOTS, NATURAL DISASTERS AND EMERGENCIES AS THEY ARISE.  THE MRAP WILL ALSO BE USED TO ASSIST MULTIPLE AGENCIES TO RESPOND TO STATEWIDE EMERGENCIES AT THE REQUEST OF THE GOVERNOR.

THIS ATV WILL BE USED TO HELP FIGHT CRIME FOR THE POLICE DEPARTMENT IN SEVERAL WAYS.  WE HAD A FLOOD LAST WEEK AND COULD HAVE USED THIS TO GET FROM ONE AREA TO ANOTHER AS IT WAS IMPASSIBLE BY CAR.  ALSO IT WILL HELP FIGHT CRIME DURING PARADES AND EVENTS WE HOST WERE NORMAL SIZE VEHICLES WILL NOT HAVE ACCESS TO.

OUR POLICE DEPARTMENT IS IN NEED OF EQUIPMENT SUCH AS DIGITAL CAMERAS TO HELP WITH COURT CASES AND HELP THE DETECTIVE SOLVE CASES THAT OFFICERS HAND OVER TO HIM, WHETHER BEING DRUG CASES OR CRIMINAL CASES.  IT WILL BE USED AS TOOL TO HELP THE DEPARTMENT FIGHT CRIME AND HAVE A HIGHER CONVICTION LEVEL IN COURT.

THE MONITOR AND COMPUTERS THAT WE HAVE AT THE POLICE DEPARTMENT NOW ARE OUT DATED.  WE HAVE A SMALL BUDGET AND ARE UNABLE TO PURCHASE ITEMS SUCH AS THIS.  IF WE DO NOT HAVE TO PURCHASE ITEMS LIKE THIS FROM OUR BUDGET IT WILL ASSIST US IN USING THE BUDGET TO FIGHT CRIME.  THE MONITORS WILL ALLOW US BETTER ACCESS TO DATABASES USED FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT SPECIFICALLY ENGINEERED TO FIGHT CRIME.

THESE CABINETS WOULD BE USED IN OUR POLICE DEPARTMENT AS EVIDENCE DIVIDERS.  IT WILL HELP US ORGANIZE EVIDENCE INSIDE OUR EVIDENCE ROOM THUS HELPING WITH ORGANIZATION AND WITH CHAIN OF CUSTODY.  CUTTING DOWN ON PROBLEMS WITH CHAIN OF CUSTODY HELPS US FIGHT CRIME BY A HIGHER CONVICTION RATE IN COURT.

WE ARE SMALL COMMUNITY WITH ONLY 1.2 SQUARE MILES, OUR FIRE DEPARTMENT IS OUTSIDE OF TOWN WITH FEW MEMBERS AND BEING ONLY VOLUNTARY.  OUR POLICE DEPARTMENT IS ON SCENE FOR FIRES FROM VEHICLE, TO HOUSE FIRES LONG BEFORE THE FIRE DEPARTMENT ARRIVES.  THIS WILL GIVE US EXTRA FIRE EXTINGUISHERS IN HOPE THAT WE CAN HAVE A SMALL FIRE CONTAINED BEFORE THE FIRE DEPARTMENT ARRIVES.

THE ENFIELD POLICE DEPARTMENT COULD USE THESE BATTERY CHARGERS FOR SEVERAL REASONS.  THE MOST IMPORTANT ONE BEING WE HAVE 3 VEHICLES THAT SIT IN A PARKING LOT AND ARE NOT DRIVEN UNTIL NEEDED, ONE BEING A HUMVEE, ONE BEING A UTILITY VEHICLE AND THE OTHER BEING AN ALL TERRAIN VEHICLE.  THESE VEHICLES ARE NEEDED OFTEN TO FIGHT CRIME IN INCLIMATE WEATHER HOWEVER THE BATTERIES ARE USUALLY NOT CHARGED AS WE NEED THEM LESS THAN ONCE A MONTH BUT WHEN THEY ARE NEEDED THEY ARE NEEDED FOR IMMEDIATE USAGE.

THIS ITEM WILL ASSIST OUR POLICE DEPARTMENT IN FIGHTING CRIME BY BEING ABLE TO STORE OUR EVIDENCE INSIDE.  THIS WILL HELP WITH THE INTEGRITY AND WILL HELP OUR CONVICTION RATE IN COURT, BY THE OFFICER HAVING A TOOLBOX IN HIS VEHICLE AND PLACING THE EVIDENCE INSIDE OF IT TO TRANSPORT TO OUR EVIDENCE ROOM.  ALSO BEING ABLE TO KEEP SOME ITEMS STORED IN THERE INSIDE THE EVIDENCE ROOM WILL BE BENIFICIAL AS WELL.

WE WOULD BE USING THIS FOR INCLEMENT WEATHER CONDITIONS SUCH AS MASS FLOODING AND SNOW. WE DO NOT CURRENTLY HAVE VEHICLES CAPABLE OF TRAVELING IN EXTREME CONDITIONS. WE COVER OVER 350 SQUARE MILES OF RESIDENTS IN HERTFORD COUNTY.

OBION COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE IS LOCATED IN NORTHWEST TENNESSEE NEAR THE MISSISSIPPI RIVER.  THE OBION RIVER AND REELFOOT LAKE ARE BOTH MAJOR WETLANDS IN THE COUNTY.  DURING THE PAST SEVERAL YEARS FLOODING IN THESE AREAS HAS BECOME AN ISSUE NUMEROUS TIMES EACH YEAR.  THE SHERIFF'S OFFICE IS REQUESTING TWO DUMP TRUCKS TO BE USED BY GUARDS TO CARRY INMATE WORK CREWS OUT TO CLEAN UP FLOOD DEBRIS IN THESE AREAS.
